column1: Uchi////My experience here was pleasant.  My friend invited me to happy hour to try the highlight dishes of the sushi restaurant.  I cannot recall the names of the dishes
column2: however each dish I tried was fantastic!  Each bite was an explosion of flavor in spite of the bite size portions.  The dish that I remember most was a dish with crackers (a fancy cracker not Ritz) and salmon.  The presentation was fantastic.  The pictures speak for itself.  Our waitress was absolutely amazing!  She was kind
column4: knowledgeable of every item on the menu
column5: and serviced us with a smile.
